statements: SELECT * FROM influencer_partnerships
SELECT partnership_id, influencer_id, engagement_score, sales_amount FROM influencer_partnerships
SELECT influencer_id, sales_amount, partnership_id, engagement_score FROM influencer_partnerships
SELECT partnership_id, engagement_score FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE sales_amount > 10000
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_partnerships FROM influencer_partnerships
SELECT * FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, COUNT(partnership_id) AS num_partnerships FROM influencer_partnerships GROUP BY influencer_id ORDER BY num_partnerships DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, AVG(sales_amount) AS avg_sales FROM influencer_partnerships GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING AVG(sales_amount) > 1000;
SELECT influencer_id, engagement_score, sales_amount FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE engagement_score > 80 AND sales_amount < 5000;
SELECT DISTINCT influencer_id FROM influencer_partnerships WHERE sales_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY influencer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerEngagement WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_id, post_date, likes FROM InfluencerEngagement WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT influencer_id, comments FROM InfluencerEngagement WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM InfluencerEngagement GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT s.influencer_id, i.post_date, s.sale_amount FROM SalesData s JOIN InfluencerEngagement i ON s.influencer_id = i.influencer_id;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerEngagement WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM InfluencerEngagement GROUP BY influencer_id
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes, SUM(comments) AS total_comments FROM InfluencerEngagement GROUP BY influencer_id ORDER BY total_likes DESC
SELECT influencer_id, AVG(likes) AS avg_likes, AVG(comments) AS avg_comments FROM InfluencerEngagement GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING AVG(likes) > 50

SELECT i.influencer_id, i.post_date, i.likes, s.sale_amount FROM InfluencerEngagement i INNER JOIN SalesData s ON i.influencer_id = s.influencer_id WHERE s.sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY i.post_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT engagement_score, engagement_date FROM EngagementData WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(total_sales) AS total_revenue FROM SalesData GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT id, name, followers FROM Influencers WHERE name LIKE '%Beauty%' ORDER BY followers ASC;
SELECT id, COUNT(*) AS engagement_count FROM EngagementData GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING engagement_count > 5 ORDER BY engagement_count DESC;
SELECT i.name, COUNT(s.id) AS sales_count FROM Influencers i JOIN SalesData s ON i.id = s.influencer_id GROUP BY i.name ORDER BY sales_count DESC;

SELECT i.name, e.engagement_score, s.total_sales FROM Influencers i JOIN EngagementData e ON i.id = e.influencer_id JOIN SalesData s ON i.id = s.influencer_id WHERE e.engagement_score > 0.08 AND s.total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY e.engagement_score DESC, s.total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM engagements ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_type, engagement_metric FROM partnerships_metrics WHERE engagement_metric > 500 ORDER BY engagement_metric DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_category, followers_count FROM influencers
SELECT * FROM engagements WHERE engagement_type = 'like'
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_date, engagement_type, engagement_metric FROM influencers JOIN engagements ON influencers.influencer_id = engagements.influencer_id
SELECT influencer_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM influencers JOIN sales ON influencers.influencer_id = sales.influencer_id
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_metric, sale_amount FROM influencers JOIN partnership_metrics ON influencers.influencer_id = partnership_metrics.influencer_id
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT partnership_id, partnership_date, partnership_fee FROM Partnerships WHERE partnership_fee > 1000;
SELECT engagement_score, engagement_date FROM EngagementData WHERE engagement_score >= 8 ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT partnership_id, engagement_score, sale_amount FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE date_analyzed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000 AND engagement_rate > 2.5 ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count < 50000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT P.influencer_id, P.partnership_id, E.engagement_score FROM Partnerships P INNER JOIN EngagementData E ON P.partnership_id = E.partnership_id WHERE E.engagement_score > 8.0;
SELECT P.partnership_id, S.sale_amount, S.sale_date FROM SalesData S INNER JOIN Partnerships P ON S.partnership_id = P.partnership_id WHERE S.sale_amount > 500 ORDER BY S.sale_date DESC;

SELECT P.influencer_name, AVG(EM.engagement_score) AS avg_engagement_score, MAX(SD.sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount FROM Influencers P INNER JOIN PerformanceMetrics EM ON P.influencer_id = EM.partnership_id INNER JOIN SalesData SD ON P.influencer_id = SD.partnership_id GROUP BY P.influencer_name;
